text: Pamasile paakufuulu awala waakutiji: “Chisimu Allah ni Masihi mwanache jwa Maryam.” Kutendaga Masihi jwatite: “E jenumanja wanache wa Israila! Mun'galagatilani Allah M'mbuje gwangu soni M'mbuje gwenu.” Chisimu jwaakum'bwanganya Allah (ni indu ine), nikuti Allah pamasile pankanyisye jwalakwejo kwinjila ku Mbepo, mwanti liuto lyakwe ni ku Moto, soni wandu walupuso ngasakola wakwakulupusya
